name: Chronicles of Mystery: The Secret Tree of Life
description:
Back of Case - Nintendo DS (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

TRAVEL THE WORLD TO DECIPHER THE MYSTERY OF THE TREE OF LIFE!

Skilled archaeologist and adventurer Sylvie Leroux now joins forces with the mysterious and shadowy Count Saint-Germain to try to uncover the mystery and legend behind the illusive Tree of Life.
  • Engrossing storyline full of thrilling and suspenseful plot twists
  • 70 different locations that intertwine with the story’s adventure and enhance the game’s atmosphere
  • Hidden object gameplay that utilizes logic and analysis, as well as several arcade mini games that create an entertaining and riveting game play experience
